abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts looks set to make its money back on a two-year-old investment in the debt of Sun Microsystems after the technology company agreed to a $7.4 billion deal to be acquired by Oracle, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts looks set to make its money back on a two-year-old investment in the debt of Sun Microsystems after the technology company agreed to a $7.4 billion deal to be acquired by Oracle, according to press reports.

headline.main: K.K.R. Said to Recoup Money on Sun Deal

abstract: In its acquisition of Sun Microsystems, Oracle sees a technology company that is a software gem, skillful in computer design and ripe for cost-cutting, The New York Times’s Steve Lohr writes.
lead_paragraph: In its acquisition of Sun Microsystems, Oracle sees a technology company that is a software gem, skillful in computer design and ripe for cost-cutting, The New York Times’s Steve Lohr writes.

headline.main: In Sun, Oracle Sees a Software Gem
